featured.text: Foggers, or bug bombs, should really be a measure of last resort.
Many people who are troubled by skin rashes caused by bug bites use “foggers,” or “bug bombs,” to get rid of the annoying crawlers in their homes.
After testing these brands on five different groups of live bedbugs for two hours, the scientists saw that the foggers had little—if any—effect on the insects.
The researchers said bedbugs hide in cracks and crevices such as under sheets and mattresses, or deep in carpets where foggers won’t reach.

other.text: What does the author advise people to do with bedbug problems? (A) Choose the right fogger.
According to the passage, which of the following statements about foggers is true? (A)
Ohio State University researchers tested three commercially sold foggers in a study on the effect of foggers on bedbugs.
How do bedbugs react to foggers?

definition.zh_def: 噴霧器，一種用於噴灑液體的設備，通常用於消毒或驅蟲。
definition.en_def: A device used to spray liquid, often for disinfection or pest control.
definition.example: The gardener used a fogger to evenly distribute the pesticide across the plants.
